name: Good Ventures SEA Limited
description: Provider of an e-commerce platform intended to offer foreign brands in Vietnam. The company's online platform is engaged in the sale of women's and men's fashion, beauty, home and kids products, enabling customers to find and buy international branded products at good deal.
one_liner: Provider of an e-commerce platform intended to offer foreign brands in Vietnam. The company's online platform is engaged in the sale of women's and men's fashion, beauty, home and kids products, enabling customers to find and buy international branded products at good deal.
